data.name: METALLIC CHILD x Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin Crossover "Of Rice and Cores"
data.detailed_description:
The first DLC of METALLIC CHILD is a crossover with Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin!
Choose from several new Customs and weapons, to go harvesting for robots!!

-A robotic Sakuna!


Customs to dress up Rona like Sakuna!
Enjoy Sakuna's cute actions!

-Three-step, Sakuna-style skills!


The Customs will come with exclusive weapons.

Bring Sakuna-style annihilation to the battlefield of METALLIC CHILD!

-Look out for the changes in the field!


It's not just a matter of looks, many changes can be found in the field, so don't miss them!

-A fierce boss!


"Black Shadow" will be waiting for you as the Keeper.
But, wait! What's that on its sides?
An onslaught of melee and energy ball attacks!!

What awaits if you triumph......?

data.short_description: METALLIC CHILD x Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin[Science Fiction x Japanese Style] [Robots x Rice] [Outer Space x Mother Earth]Check out this unique crossover!
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows®10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3330 / AMD Ryzen™ 3100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 / AMD Radeon™ R7260X
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows®10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen™ 3100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 / AMD Radeon™ R7370
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
